thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pas mal du tout!
thread.title_full: Pas mal du tout! - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Leroy32
title: Pas mal du tout!
text: We were delighted to stumble upon this little gem. Located superbly in a quiet corner off the Boulevard Beaumarchais, right in the heart of the Marais. Decor is a bit dated but looks highly original. Rooms are overlooking the courtyard so they are very quiet. The breakfast is lovely and offers plenty of choice. Will be back!
